about_the_game:
Embark on a rhythmic journey like no other in Taka Taka, a yokai-themed rhythm game.

Take control of Oni and Tengu, dancing through four lanes, swapping between them to match colors and strike down enemy yokai. Experience colorful visuals and immerse yourself in a dynamic soundtrack, fusing traditional Japanese melodies with modern beats.

Master timing and coordination to face incoming yokai and become a legendary rhythm master.

Get ready to smash, slice, and avoid yokai to save the watermelon village in Taka Taka.
